Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Southbound Reroute near 132nd/Exchange
ShortDescription: SB 30 buses are temporarily rerouted via 132nd, Escanaba, and Brainard due to street blockage near 132nd/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via 132nd, Escanaba, and Brainard due to street blockage near 132nd/Exchange .

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near LSD/47th
ShortDescription: NB 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage, and Pershing due to, street blockage near LSD/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage, and Pershing due to, street blockage near LSD/47th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses temp. rerouted EB: Roosevelt, Michigan, 16th, and Wabash; WB: Wabash and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Roosevelt/Michigan, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, Michigan, 16th, and Wabash.

Westbound buses will operate via Wabash and Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.
